title: Venezuela, Jobs & Superbowl
itunes:title: Venezuela, Jobs & Superbowl
description:
Kevin Cirilli discusses what's happening in Venezuela, the U.S. jobless rate, and also previews the Superbowl with Brandon Etheridge.

Guests: 

Brandon Etheridge, General Counsel for Baltimore Ravens

Shannon Pettypiece, Bloomberg News White House Reporter

Craig Gordon, Bloomberg News Washington Bureau Chief

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
